mapper.select: select c.cou_code,i.INS_ID, COU_NAME, CONTENT, OPENDATE, BANNER_IMG, COU_PERIOD, SAMPLE_VIDEO, HITS, FINAL_APPROVE, i.ins_name, i.ins_profile,(crg.registrationdate+c.cou_period) courseperiod,completion_status, c.cou_code, e.exam_Timelimit, cc.enroll_rate, cc.exam_results, crg.registrationdate,progress_Rate, CR_COUNT, ui.ui_name ,ep.exam_status, ep.re_exam, crg.crg_code, ep_code,e.exam_code, ep.exam_score, (select count(*) from COURSE_REGISTRATION where cou_code = #{couCode} and COMPLETION_STATUS = 'Y') completeCnt from COURSES c, INSTRUCTOR i,course_registration crg, completion_criteria cc, user_info ui, EXAM_PARTICIPATION ep,EXAM e where c.ins_id = i.ins_id and crg.crg_code = #{crgCode} and crg.ui_id = ui.ui_id and c.cou_code = e.cou_Code and c.cou_code = crg.cou_code and c.cc_code = cc.cc_code and ep.crg_code = crg.crg_code and ep.ep_code = #{epCode}

select CN_CODE, i.INS_ID, CN_TITLE, CN_DATE, cou_code, CN_CONTENT, INS_NAME,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CN_DATE) ind from COURSES_NOTICE cn, INSTRUCTOR i where cou_code = #{couCode} and i.ins_id = cn.ins_id order by ind desc
select CN_CODE, CN_TITLE, CN_DATE, CN_CONTENT, i.ins_name from COURSES_NOTICE cn, INSTRUCTOR i where cn_code = #{cnCode} and i.ins_id = cn.ins_id

select lec.LEC_CODE, LEC_NAME, LEC_CONTENT, VIDEO_NAME, COURSE_STATUS, crg.crg_code from LECTURES lec, COURSE_RECORD cr, COURSE_REGISTRATION crg where lec.cou_code = #{couCode} and cr.ui_id = #{uiId} and crg.crg_code = #{crgCode} and lec.lec_code = cr.lec_code and crg.crg_code = cr.crg_code order by lec.lec_Code
mapper.update: update COURSE_RECORD set COURSE_STATUS = 'Y', COURSEDATE = sysdate where LEC_CODE = #{lecCode} and COU_CODE = #{couCode} and CRG_CODE = #{crgCode} and COURSE_STATUS = 'N'
mapper.select: select EXAM_STATUS, re_exam from EXAM e, EXAM_PARTICIPATION ep where ep.COU_CODE = #{couCode} and ui_id = #{uiId} and ep.crg_code = #{crgCode} and ep.cou_code = e.cou_code and ep.ep_code = #{epCode}
select exam_pass from EXAM_PARTICIPATION where crg_code = #{crgCode} and exam_pass = 'Y'
